abstract: Marc D. Granetz, the chairman of Credit Suisse’s investment banking department and a longtime mergers banker, is leaving the firm for another opportunity outside deal-making, according to an internal memorandum.

lead_paragraph: Marc D. Granetz, the chairman of Credit Suisse‘s investment banking department and a longtime mergers banker, is leaving the firm for another opportunity outside deal-making, according to an internal memorandum reviewed by DealBook.
